title: 105: Talking Trash & Sustainable Living
itunes:title: 105: Talking Trash & Sustainable Living
description:
The Broads sit down with Sierra Zamarripa (owner of Lovewild Design - a sustainable gift and stationary line in Brooklyn, NY) and chat all about sustainable living! They discuss practical tips to help live a sustainable life, palm oil, co-ops, buying in bulk, eating plastic, “zero-waste”, eating veg, cloth diapers, fashion, tips for the holiday season, and more! 
SIERRA ZAMARRIPA & LOVEWILD DESIGN:
Follow at @lovewilddesign 
Make sure to check out her store and all the amazing items for purchase: https://lovewilddesign.com (https://lovewilddesign.com/)
And the “Low Waste Essentials”: https://lovewilddesign.com/collections/low-waste-essentials
